MetaData.MetaDataItem: The LPT_SM1H is a plug-in Slave to receive the Command from the Controller or Routing Slave and through Controller or Routing Slave controls the ON/OFF status of the plug-in lighting fixures, of which power loading can't exceed 600 W.
Plug Switch 919.8 MHz Z-Wave ON/OFF Plug - 300 Series
